result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mauricio Degollado

records.addlTxt:
1:36 PM Defendant Mauricio Degollado in court, in custody from Ozaukee County.  Attorney Gerardo Antonio De Los Santos Jr in court for Mauricio Degollado.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Atty De Los Santos and State seeking to adjourn Trial due to still waiting for material from crime lab. Not prepared to proceed.
DA Urmanski has crime lab report that should have been sent to Defense. Also spoke to crime lab and due to challenges in testing by Defense requested an "addendum" to crime lab report to include CBD. Will work with Atty De Los Santos regarding resolution.
Defense believes Discovery may be exculpatory. Has report and analysis, but has not requested litigation packet.
State will request litigation packet and provide as part of Discovery and will share additional results when received also.
Defense believes case may resolve.
Court removes Jury Trial from calendar.
Court sets STC by phone, but if case will be resolving and Atty De Los Santos wants Deft to appear in person, will need to contact JA and State will have to prepare a WRIT.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 04:30 pm.
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 04:30 pm.
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 04:30 pm.

2:04 PM Defendant Mauricio Degollado in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerardo Antonio De Los Santos Jr in court for Mauricio Degollado.  Attorney Daniel j Gabler Mr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Daubert hearing-Defense is requesting a quantitative amount of THC in the tested substance from analyst. Defense is not contesting that there is some amount of THC found. Court doesn't feel defense argument is appropriate for a daubert hrg and thinks the jury should hear this and decide. Defense withdraws their daubert motion. MIL, WL and jury instructions due 72 hours prior to the FPT.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial on October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on October 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

1:36 PM Defendant Mauricio Degollado appeared by phone, in custody at Ozaukee Cty Jail.  Attorney Daniel j Gabler Mr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Gerardo Antonio De Los Santos Jr appeared by phone for Mauricio Degollado. 
Crime lab reports has been received. 
State reviewed Daubert motion filed by Defense. 
Defense requests 1.5hr - 2hr Daubert hearing. 
ADA Gabler contacts crime lab to verify the expert can appear in person at Daubert hearing.
Motion hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

3:10 PM Prosecuting attorney Daniel j Gabler Mr. in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Mauricio Degollado in court, in custody at SCDC.  Attorney Gerardo Antonio De Los Santos Jr in court for Mauricio Degollado. 
Deputy Steven Wimmer sworn and testified, D, X.
Witness IDs deft in person. 
Probable Cause Found, Defendant bound over.
Information to be efiled/reading waived by Attorney De Los Santos, Not guilty plea entered all Counts. 
Defense reviews motion to modify bond. 
State requests $10,000 cash.
Court modifies bond to $1500 cash and also modifies conditions including the removal of day reporting. 
Court sets for a JT so crime lab tests drugs. 
Defense moves to withdraw motion for scientific testing.
